property.description: True if an element is considered 'abstract' - in other words, the code is not for use as a real concept.

concept.definition: The purpose or content of the notification is a prescription refill request.
The purpose or content of the notification is a progress update.
The purpose or content of the notification is to report labs.
The purpose or content of the notification is an appointment reminder.
The purpose or content of the notification is a phone consult.
The purpose or content of the notification is a summary report.
The purpose or content a notification about an event. Usage Note: This is a high level code and should not be used in the value set - it is a grouper code for notifications of any kind.
The purpose or content of a notification about a patient who undergoes a hospital's admission process to receive treatment and/or care.

The purpose or content of a notification about a patient who is discharged when they longer need to receive care and can go home or is sent you to another to another facility or hospital or to another department in the same hospital.
The purpose or content of a notification about a patient who is transferred to another facility or hospital or to another department in the same hospital.
The purpose or content a notification about a referral for consultation.
The purpose or content a notification about a change in treatment - either the start or the end.
The purpose or content a notification about lab results being available.
The purpose or content a notification about a problem that is applicable to a treatment the patient is receiving such as drug or device recall or reported issue.
The purpose or content a notification about a Device having been ordered for the patient.
The purpose or content a notification about a change to the Prior Authorization (Pended to Approved/Denied).
The purpose or content a notification about a new diagnosis / condition.
The purpose or content a notification about changes occurring in the care team.
The purpose or content a notification about changes in insurance coverage, either the start or the end.
The purpose or content a notification about change in the social circumstances of the patient (Social Determinants of Health).
The purpose or content a notification about a Public Health event.
The purpose or content a notification about the start of an outpatient encounter.
The purpose or content a notification about either the birth or death of the patient.
The purpose or content a notification about a change in prescription status for a medication at the pharmacy (Pickup, Restock, Dispense).
The purpose or content a notification about healthcare services that are rendered under Workman's Compensation rules.
